params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>3</mn>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>12</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mtext>A</mtext>
      </mrow>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>12</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{3_{12}} \times {{\text{A}}_{12}}</annotation></semantics></math>
